alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 2:26AM PST until February 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches, with highest amounts expected from Mt Jefferson south. Locally heavier amounts on higher volcanic peaks. The heaviest snowfall will be Sunday morning into Sunday afternoon. Southwest winds gusting up to 45 mph are expected for exposed terrain, especially in the Oregon Cascades, likely resulting in blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
